text: Roger Charles Allers (born June 29, 1949) is an American animator, film director, playwright, screenwriter and storyboard artist. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American animators Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Screenwriters from New York (state)
title: Roger Allers
